column1:
.example-enter {
      opacity: 0.01;
    }
    
    .example-enter.example-enter-active {
      opacity: 1;
      transition: opacity 500ms ease-in;
    }
    
    .example-leave {
      opacity: 1;
    }
    
    .example-leave.example-leave-active {
      opacity: 0.01;
      transition: opacity 300ms ease-in;
    }
